title: How to Manage XDP/eBPF Effectively for Better DDoS Protection
author: Ivan Koveshnikov
description: Extended Berkeley Packet Filter’s ability to enable quick, uninterrupted updates makes it ideal for handling frequent security configuration changes.
cntitle: 如何有效管理 XDP/eBPF 以获得更好的 DDoS 保护
cndescription: 扩展的 Berkeley 数据包过滤器能够快速、不间断地进行更新，非常适合处理频繁的安全配置更改。
